game.name: Ghost Rider
game.description:
Playing with a ghost can always be a rewarding experience especially if you are a lover of movie games! You can have a pleasure of experiencing the same here in this fictional bike racing game. Join Ghost Rider game and get ready to face off the scary yet exciting challenges! It will be amazing to help the protagonist Ghost rider enjoy his new journey when you decide to play this cool motorbike racing game. You are sure to enjoy the fabulous effects at full acceleration. 

Control the speed and acceleration of the vehicle to get it through all the hurdles and obstacles you see on the screen! Make sure that the motorbike maintains its balance even if it runs at top speed. Feel free to perform some amazing stunts to help him reach the destination in this one of the best motorbike games for kids! Show off your helping hands to the powerful Ghost Rider and guide him during the journey through the hell! 

He is in a hurry and wants to give a strong reply to Mephisto and break Jonny free from the course. It is up to you now to reach him fast and fight against the forces of hell. Do not lose hope and give your best to complete your salvation in this one of the addictive motorcycle games! The character serves as a semi-sequel to the movie Ghost Rider. Move your character using the arrow keys, select with space and start your game through enter! Good luck to have a blast in our cool HTML5 bike game!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Ghost Rider at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: RIGHT SCREEN ICONS TO SPEED AND JUMP FROUNT, LEFT ICONS TO BACK AND BACK FLIP
game.webControlKeys: S,DOWN ARROW TO GO BACK,A,D L-R ARROW TO STABLE THE BIKE,W AUP ARROW TO MOVE
